GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.16.11
GSD.description:
crypto: af_alg - get rid of alg_memory_allocated

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.11 by commit 9d06f489b9e901580159e21fdc29f73df7ed08dc, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 2bb2f5fb21b0486ff69b7b4a1fe03a760527d133. For more details please see the references link.
